snippet: Looking to see whether minorities were burdened unfairly, the Justice Department asked Maricopa County officials to explain why the number of polling places had been reduced.
abstract: Justice Dept opens investigation into Maricopa County, Ariz, election debacle that left thousands of voters unable to participate in Arizona's presidential primaries.
lead_paragraph: Looking to see whether minorities were burdened unfairly, the Justice Department asked Maricopa County officials to explain why the number of polling places had been reduced.

headline.main: U.S. Seeks Answers to Delays at Phoenix-Area Polls on Primary Day
headline.print_headline: U.S. Seeks Answers to Delays at Phoenix-Area Polls on Primary Day
